OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

pcre-ocaml

  • 6.2.5
  • 7.0.2
  • version 7.0.3
  • 7.0.4
Maintainer markus.mottl@gmail.com
Dependencies ocamlfind & conf-libpcre
Last update Dec 19, 2013
Source https://bitbucket.org/mmottl/pcre-ocaml/downloads/pcre-ocaml-7.0.3.tar.gz
103458e28c8a4a894e5fbe0cd9e1cd80

Interface to the PCRE (Perl-compatibility regular expressions) library

This OCaml-library interfaces the C-library PCRE (Perl-compatibility Regular Expressions). It can be used for matching regular expressions which are written in "PERL"-style.

Dependencies
conf-libpcre
ocamlfind
